name: Rabbit Overload
description:
Would you like giant rabbits chasing your back? Neither would I. Made a game where rabbits are roaming and chasing you while you are stranded on a rouge planet in the universe. Evade the rabbits while collecting the coins.

Controls:

Move Left - LeftArrow/A

Move Right - RightArrow/D

Move Up - UpArrow/W

Move Down - DownArrow/S

Jump - Spacebar

Quit/BackToMenu - Escape 

Have fun playing the game!

I would appreciate any feedback you provide below in the comments!
